HCAHPS Question: How do patients rate the hospital overall?
HCAHPS Answer Description: Patients who gave a rating of 9 or 10 (high)

HCAHPS Answer Description: Patients who gave a rating of 7 or 8 (medium)

HCAHPS Question: How do patients rate the hospital overall?
HCAHPS Answer Description: Patients who gave a rating of 6 or lower (low)

HCAHPS Answer Description: YES, patients would definitely recommend the hospital
